languages.text: "Этот пестрый ксенос... его цвета отличаются от цветов его сородичей. Они словно... вывернуты наизнанку".
"This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."
languages.original_text: "Этот пестрый ксенос... его цвета отличаются от цветов его сородичей. Они словно... вывернуты наизнанку".

traits.locale_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那个多彩的异形……他的颜色与他的同类截然不同，就好像他……里里外外，上上下下，都尽数颠倒了一样。”
languages.original_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: “那个多彩的异形……他的颜色与他的同类截然不同，就好像他……里里外外，上上下下，都尽数颠倒了一样。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce xénos... Les couleurs qui l'entourent sont bien différentes de celles de ses semblables. Comme si elles avaient été... complètement inversées. »
languages.original_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: « Ce xénos... Les couleurs qui l'entourent sont bien différentes de celles de ses semblables. Comme si elles avaient été... complètement inversées. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Ese xenos colorido... tiene tonos muy distintos al resto de su gente. Es como si les... hubieran dado la vuelta y los hubieran puesto boca abajo».
languages.original_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: «Ese xenos colorido... tiene tonos muy distintos al resto de su gente. Es como si les... hubieran dado la vuelta y los hubieran puesto boca abajo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この色彩あふれる異種族は…同胞とは違う色相をもっています。まるで…裏返しにして上下を返したような」
languages.original_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: 「この色彩あふれる異種族は…同胞とは違う色相をもっています。まるで…裏返しにして上下を返したような」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Dieser bunte Xenos ... hat andere Farben als seine Verwandten. Als wären sie ... von innen nach außen gestülpt und auf den Kopf gestellt worden."
languages.original_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser bunte Xenos ... hat andere Farben als seine Verwandten. Als wären sie ... von innen nach außen gestülpt und auf den Kopf gestellt worden."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

languages.text: "Bu renkli zeno... Soydaşı diğer zenolara nazaran farklı tonlara sahip. Sanki... İçi dışına çıkmış, tepetaklak olmuş."
languages.original_text: "This colourful xenos... has hues different to those of its kin. It is as if they have been... turned inside out and upside down."

traits.locale_text: "Bu renkli zenolar... Soyundan diğer zenolara nazaran farklı renk tonlarına sahip. Sanki... İçleri dışlarına çıkmış ve tepetaklak olmuş gibi."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
